person.persName: Joseph Berger (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, laborer.)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, laborer. Native of Switzerland. Son of Peter Berger and Mary Berger. Charged with robbing George Gross in Louisville Police Court in December 1862. Acquitted of robbery in Jefferson Circuit Court in May 1863.
